name: Cleveland-Cliffs Inc.
description: Cleveland-Cliffs Inc. is a leading integrated producer of steel and iron ore in North America, with a rich history dating back to the 1840s. The company has transformed itself from a mining company into a full-fledged steel producer, focusing on high-quality, value-added products. Cleveland-Cliffs operates several facilities across the United States and Canada, producing a range of flat-rolled and long products primarily for the automotive, construction, and appliance industries. The company is committed to sustainability and reducing its environmental impact through various initiatives, including the use of advanced technologies in steel production and a focus on recycling and reducing waste. Cleveland-Cliffs also emphasizes the importance of innovation, continuously investing in its operations to enhance efficiency and product quality. With a strategic focus on domestic sourcing and a robust supply chain, Cleveland-Cliffs aims to meet the growing demand for steel in North America while contributing to the economic development of the regions in which it operates.

faq.question: What does Cleveland-Cliffs produce?
faq.answer: Cleveland-Cliffs produces steel and iron ore products, including flat-rolled and long steel products.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Cleveland-Cliffs?
faq.answer: Lourenco Goncalves is the CEO of Cleveland-Cliffs Inc.

faq.question: Where is Cleveland-Cliffs headquartered?
faq.answer: Cleveland-Cliffs is headquartered in Cleveland, Ohio, USA.
